decision: Mobile App: React Native (Expo) for App Store
context: Need native app for iOS App Store and Google Play. PWA not acceptable.
rationale: React Native gives native performance, single codebase, and Expo simplifies App Store deployment. Team has React experience.

decision: SMS OTP via Twilio Verify (not standard Twilio SMS)
context: Standard Twilio SMS blocked by carriers due to 10DLC requirements.
rationale: Twilio Verify bypasses 10DLC restrictions, works immediately.

context: Need branded emails from looplocal.io, not Supabase default.
rationale: MailChannels discontinued free tier. Resend has free tier, simple SMTP setup, good DX.

decision: Supabase for backend (auth, database, edge functions)
context: Need managed backend with auth, real-time, and serverless functions.
rationale: Supabase has excellent Postgres, row-level security, edge functions. Already invested.

decision: OXO token with bonding curve unlock mechanism
context: Need reward token that appreciates and has unlock/vesting mechanics.
rationale: Bonding curve creates natural appreciation. Unlock meter gamifies holding.

decision: Multi-Loop model with siloed rewards per merchant
context: Users can belong to multiple merchant Loops, each with separate balances.
rationale: Siloed rewards let merchants control their own pools. Users see value per relationship.
